website_summaries.verdict: Water resistant and easy to control, this groomer makes shaving in the shower a lot easier and more affordable.
pros: Lightweight and easy to grip, allowing for more mobility when body grooming
Powerful enough to handle longer hair
Plastic guards provide additional protection against nicks
cons: Batteries drain quickly and must be replaced frequently
Blades can dull quickly if not cleaned regularly
Trimmer motor can fail after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Better than the women's bikini trimmers on the market
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing a dozen "women's" bikini shavers that were twice the cost of the SAME men's product, I decided to purchase this product instead of a woman-specific model. I love it and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for trimming your balls!
customer_reviews.text: So everyone wants to know if this is a good trimmer for the down under. I put it to the test yesterday when it arrived. It comes with 3 plastic guards, but if you want a close shave you can use it without a guard. The blades are close together so it won't pull the pubes or nick your nuts. After your haircut your ball sac will be happy and silky smooth. Ready for action. My nuts haven't been this hair free since I was 13!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's not safe for the body
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous.. For the beard it might work, but even for that the blade is extremely small so I wouldn't use it unless you only have a 3 day beard-shade. It does cause minor cuts and will make your privates bleed so I don't know which dermatoligsts tested this product or if they just tested it on the arms and chest. 100% not recommended, there's no way to get a close trim like you would with a Braun body cruzer for instance (using the sensitive guard). Wanted to look a cheaper alternative (the cruzer now costs around $80) but this is not the one. Anyways returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Aref Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Use With Caution on Sensitive Areas
customer_reviews.text: This device received reviews that it was great for shaving man parts but that is far from the truth for me. The little blades bite constantly on soft skin even if you pull the skin tight first. The good news is that this shaver does a great job on the less sensitive areas as long as you take your time and give it time to clip the hairs. I almost returned it when it drew blood but was impressed with how well it trimmed the less sensitive areas. The razor attachment is a waste of time and an unnecessary additional expense. Better to use the #1 shield on this shaver and buy your favorite razor for the detailed work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Neil

customer_reviews.title: Good for the fellas.
customer_reviews.text: You ever nicked your sack? Did "Manscaped" catfish you with their $75 "Top of the line Lawnmower" with "NO NICK TECHNOLOGY" just for you to slice your fuzzy bits into pieces yet again? SameTM. I stepped out of my comfort zone yet again to buy the Styler because I'm tired of having a second beard. (IS IT SUPPOSED TO GROW FASTER WITH AGE!?) But seriously, the styler makes cleaning your dong pillows a breeze. Obviously there's still a slight risk of clipping your scrote if you're not at least a little careful. However, so long as you're not digging into your chin warmers with it, you should be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Barton

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend said it was a great compact size and gets the job done with little chance of nicks or cuts. We keep it in our medicine cabinet and I was surprised the whole stand could fit in there.
customer_reviews.author: SmithStine

customer_reviews.title: Best trimmer for women
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: It doesn't work anymore :( !!!! I have used it only 2 times. I loved it, but not sure why it has stopped working. So sad, disapponted & frustated. Original Review: I use it without any attachments to trim my groin area. Love it. Does a great job. It’s so easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samir & Lopa Kapur

customer_reviews.title: Smaller is better....
customer_reviews.text: i have bought these 100 dollars super fancy bread trimmers, and NEVER did half of of what this bad boy does!! Ease to use: 10/10 design: 10/10 Battery life: depends on what 2 AAA batteries u use.. I LOVE the fact it has 3 guards for trimming your beard... then u can take off the guard and shave the unwanted bottom hairs... PLUS they give you a 5 blade razor that is adaptable to 3-5 blade replacements (depending on close of blade... ((the less blades is actually closer)) im sure it sounds like i work for these people at this point but GREAT value 11/10!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jmt

customer_reviews.title: Total Disaster
customer_reviews.text: The multi-blade shaver is awful. It is extremely sharp and hard to maneuver around bearded areas to trim. I actually do better with 5 for $1 single blade razors from discount houses. I was stupid enough to purchase not only the basic proglide styler, but also what looks like a life-time supply of those miserable blades. So with over $50 tied up in this package, I will either give it away or throw it away, since it is past the return expiration date. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Gene L. Mrava

customer_reviews.title: Buy This One!
customer_reviews.text: The best trimmer for the money. This is the first beard trimmer I have used where it Does Not pull any hairs and cuts right through a thick beard. You can easily clean the trimmer head under the faucet with water. You don't have to take it apart, just pop the trimmer head back to expose the stubble underneath the trimmer head. Seriously, I can't say enough good things about this item. It comes with a AA Duracell inside ready to go. Also this trimmer is made by Braun for Gillette. You are not buying junk with this one. You are reading this from a customer and this one is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Ljay

customer_reviews.title: This woman approves!
customer_reviews.text: Ok...Im allergic to metal on my skin especially in private areas. I was recommended this because I dont want to embrace All Natural 100% and I like the look of a maintained area. So yes, it works and is so easy to use. I dont get any irritation as the metal isnt touching the skin! Highly recommend over the bs marketed products for women's bikini area. Highly recommend. No nicks, super easy to use with the guard on it for whatever style youre going for
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Gillette - a good product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping via Amazon - thank you - Gillette - a name to trust - this does exactly what I need it to do - a bit of man-scaping - great for hard to shave places near the ears, sideburns and even a body shaver. It's very precise and clean shaves with precision. This is not a rechargeable shaver and I knew this when I ordered. For the pricing point it will work exactly as intended and offers the same precision as regular Gillette shavers at an affordable cost. I use Gillette battery face shavers so I am not really concerned about battery life. All good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Oldenburg

customer_reviews.title: Totally waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Item worked good for one week, and then started using the battery too much to the point that it needed to be replaced every 2-3 uses. It finally stopped working regardless of changing with new batteries after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product  is a little on the cheap side.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little on the cheap side. Light weight and difficult to maintain grip and angle of cutting edge. The motor head starts out being quiet. After a few uses the motor noise increases and the vacuum trap quickly becomes clogged and difficult to keep clean. The vacuum clean trap head has a single push button on the side of main body. This buttton hangs up due to hair accumulation and eventually the tiny return spring fell out, trying to open and clean the trap. This item is toylike in nature and design. This includes both main body and the attachments. It does not impress me to be a long lasting instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Turd
customer_reviews.text: Well, I wanted to like this trimmer, but after a few weeks, it went kaplut. Glad it was only $16, because that's all I lost on the deal. I wouldn't recommend this to ANYONE. It just quit. A new battery didn't help. I never got it wet either.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive around sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to trim those sensitive areas (yes by that I mean pubic area) since we’re not too fond of the after effects of shaving. This works great! We’ve been using it with the #1 guard to get the closest trim possible and it’s perfect. Other trimmers we’ve gotten usually tug on the skin causing cuts or just making it hurt and we got nothing out of this one. I would definitely recommend it for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth & Riki Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product, Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when buying, the photo is not the same as the final product which is received, I say this because I bought one a year ago and I still have it, today I received the same product but new and when I look closely it does not bring the name Styler on the machine, apparently I am almost sure that the product is Fake.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept because it’s compact and great for travel. It worked pretty well for about a week, then I thought the battery died, and I had hardly used it. I replaced the battery with two different batteries just to make sure, but it still was dead. I tried to return it to Amazon but they directed me to the Gillette website. I sent a message describing the issue but did not get a response, so I’m left with a useless wasted purchase. Very disappointing both from Amazon and Gillette. I can accept that a product fails once in a while, but to get no support is a different story. I unfortunately would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: great product but I shouldn't have to reorder the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it 5 stars but all I needed was the attachments for the one I own. I now own two because I had to reorder the whole unit just to get a replacement for the number two length attachment. Come on Gillette, great product but I shouldn't have to reorder the whole thing just for an attachment replacement!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Lerback

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit?
customer_reviews.text: I have numerous reasons to believe this product is counterfeit. On my original Styler the words Styler appears on one side of it. This does not appear on the Amazon one. The blue coloring on my original and the Amazon one is different. My Amazon one came in a box. The store-bought ones come in a enclosed plastic case. Finally, the batteries in the Amazon one come from China. I have bought several store-bought ones and they always use Duracell.
customer_reviews.author: RMK

customer_reviews.title: Good Multi Trimming Shaving Kit!!! :D
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have the Gillette Fusion 5 Proshield Razor, I don't always shave because just get lazy of shaving all of the time. This product came out before the Fusion 5 Proshield, this was for thick beards as well, and a brand I stick with. It definitely did well trimming & shaving my beard by just using 1 tool instead of pulling out the hair clippers like I usually do. This did both as in just shorting the hair way down low so I could use the attachment to shave as well. Love It!!!
customer_reviews.author: DarthSweetTooth

customer_reviews.title: All I wanna do is groom-a groom groom groom...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little shaver. I had one for years and misplaced it. Bought two more (one for myself, one for my father.) It’s the perfect little beard and mustache trimmer. Can groom your broom too if you know what I mean... lol. The attachments, 1, 2, and 3 are perfect lengths for what you use this for. Go bare and it gets a close shave and trim. Uses one AA battery. Battery lasts awhile. Blades stay sharp. Easy to handle. Easy to clean. Lasts... Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Odell

customer_reviews.title: Legs.. Yes. Lady bits.. No.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my lady bits and legs/pits. The size of the handle is amazing not bulky. the razor attachment is phenomenal, I love that it has "shocks" goes very smoothly over my legs and pits. Using it for the lady bits.. Well, to trim with the guides on I think will work just fine. But to use the devise without any attachment to get a bare or almost bare shave is not ideal with this device. Be warned you will get kicked pretty good down under!
customer_reviews.author: The mrs.

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: Beard isn't thick, bogs down, horrendous. Don't know where these other reviews came from, but never again.
customer_reviews.author: Bhinde99

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible shaver. Stopped working after only using a couple of times. The design is horrible. Save your money and. Buy another shaver with a trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Flower@509

customer_reviews.title: Works well for that it's worth
customer_reviews.text: For what it's worth... Works very well. We (my partner and I) use it below the belt and we don't feel any discomfort. But we're both Asian and I can honestly say our skin isn't the most sensitive. I give it a thumbs up! Only issues are, the combs seem to be made of cheap material and aren't available for sale separately. If one breaks, you would need to buy the whole thing all over again. Keeping that in mind... I'm rating it at a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: enevelin

customer_reviews.title: No more waxing for me!
customer_reviews.text: Trimmed my goatee and the undercarriage and it performed beautifully. I have to say, I did nick myself (No worse than a razor) on the undercarriage but that was my fault. Take your time with it. Also, if you are like me and have a thin line of skin that runs down your undercarriage, go against the grain, not with it. Other than that I was super happy with this purchase. Thanks 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Small, works, but battery hog - DIED AFTER 1 YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Update: After a year it stopped working. Will run full speed with new battery when top flipped open, but close it to shave and won't run at all. Useless. Have to throw away now and find something else. Great little trimmer. I like to use it on face to get a stubble look. Gets in tight places like mustache better than electric shaver attachments. Uses battery quickly though, my only knock on it.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Precise, cost effective, and compatible
customer_reviews.text: Best part about this purchase is that its compatible with all of those Gilette blade heads! Like an all-in-one device for all your shaving needs. Took me a long time to find this gem after searching for a blade does that everything I need it to. I didn't want to pay an arm and a leg for a quality shaver/clipper and didn't want to waste any of my old gilette blades. This was perfect. Highly recommended for all your personal needs. Specially for those date nights.
customer_reviews.author: Aku

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Have purchasef it a few mo ths ago and still use it when my beard grows. I like to even out my facial beard. Using the different size and small clipper has been helpful and painless. It does not pluck out hair like other reviews i have seen. I still keep the product in its original box.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier23

customer_reviews.title: Get the right shave the first time
customer_reviews.text: Gillette has never let me down. This product was affordable and is well worth it. Cleaning my face has never been so easy. I used the machine shaver to cut down the thicker hairs so that the blade can glide fairly close to my face. The result was a clean and natural felt skin with no bristle or ruff feel left over. The only thing that could be better is well if Gillette provided maybe 1 or 2 extra razor blades with this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R

customer_reviews.title: Like it alot!
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to use. Waterproof is what I was really looking forward to. I like the razor attachment to kinda keep it all in one small package to save space in the shower and not have clutter. Did knick my private areas but it was too bad. I feel like there will never be a machine to fully be %100 knick free.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Avila

customer_reviews.title: Works but gets clogged and is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. It has a lot of power at first but then the power lessens and it also gets clogged with hair and its hard to clean. The onlt redeeming quality is the razor attachment and the ability to use it in the shower. The clogging slows down the blades and makes the trimmer less effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars, 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time buying this, the reason is i accidentally left my first one in a hotel. I bought it on walmart and they don’t carry it anymore was happy when I saw it available here in amazon, 5 stars I can say this is the best one for me, I’ve had my first one for a long time. I like the cut , easy to use, battery operated, one battery lasts for a long time, light and small.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last but awesome while it works
customer_reviews.text: I love this. However this is my third one. As soon as the battery dies, it’s like the entire thing dies. They usually last about a year then it won’t work any loner. I keep it clean so idk why this happens. When it works, it is awesome & does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality. Perfect for body hair. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: We're not supposed to use our head/face/beard trimmers on our bodies, especially not on the pubic area because of the different kinds of bacteria. With that in mind, this product is an outstanding affordable trimmer for your body hair. Sure, it could work for lining up beards and such but if you're serious about manscaping your face you're better off buying a higher quality trimmer for that. One, I would suggest, that doesn't run on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: LOUI5

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather wanted a razor and i found this one and saw great reviews about it so ordered it for him. it got delivered and he has been using it but it is not that comfortable to use for an aged person. The battery life seems to be good but its a little difficult for him to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Heta

customer_reviews.title: Possibly tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I imagine it works good since it’s gillette but I feel like mine came opened. Parts started falling out when I opened the box and now I looked at the battery and it’s a brand I’ve never seen when the instructions clearly show Duracell. So idk if someone is taking out the Duracell batteries and replacing with cheap ones or what. Really just is odd. No wonder it went on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic only kept it because of big nice grip handle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the big handle for my razor, only that's why I kept it rather than returning to Amazon. Otherwise, all attachment is made of cheap plastic. But it's worth of price, of only one company name ”Art is shaving” makes a big nice grip aftermarket handle for Gillette. But their price are $70 plus only for just handle. In that case this was good deal. And of course I got cyber Monday deal too.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact, not much difference in comb sizes
customer_reviews.text: The photo of the combs is misleading, the actual combs have very little difference in size. I would like it better if the longer comb actually were perceptibly longer. That said, if you want a close trim and travel a lot, this is a very compact little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Daly

customer_reviews.title: Works great, don’t shave your dog
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally broke this by trying to shave our dog (not the whole dog, she just had a wound on her foot I wanted to get a better look at to clean). So I bought my bf a new one. Works great! Just not for shaving dogs lol
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Gillette all purp.style beard trim.works
customer_reviews.text: Well first of all I do not know what these people are talking about when they give you guys a low rating on the Gillette All Purpose style beard trimmer, this is absolutely awesome after I got it from Amazon earlier today I wasted no time for me trim down my goatee.because I was beginning to look like the late professional wrestler Jim the Anvil Neidhart. people listen up read the instructions this thing works it absolutely Works easy to hook up easy to disconnect easy to clean thank you Gillette I appreciate it very very much I look and feel a lot better
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cope

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed how easy this was to use not ever having owned a beard trimmer before it couldn’t be any more simple to understand and use with the different attachment heads Helps you to keep your beard managed and presentable
customer_reviews.author: Shomare

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Tried hard to like this thing, problem is the lowest available setting for beard length is too high for me, if I want to get down to near stubble then I would like that option, this doesn't come close. That said, I realize different people have different needs so I'm not going to give it 1 star just because it didn't suit me.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I really wanted this size of a trimmer. The quality is strong. I would say the one negative is the size guards. No guard gives you the scruff look. I dont use any of the other guards. They are just too big. I do use the trimmer without the guards. You just need to be careful or you will gash your scruff. 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RandyK

customer_reviews.title: I feel like buying one for every member in my family
customer_reviews.text: People need to buy this, now with this corona virus going on I even cut my hair with this little machine and it did just good as a bigger one would've done. I just simply love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loved it. Great Father's Day gift. I do however wish the box was just a little bit more discreet. He knew what it was right away, so he ended up getting it early. Still it was a great gift. Delivery was lightning fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hall

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these for a couple years and worked great till hard water build up finally killed it. This last one only lasted a few months before it jammed up. I'm not a hairy dude but just a small amount of hair kept it from operating.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Great Performance, Great Package
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day. It allows you to have all of the trimming and grooming coverage that you would need in a small organized package. It makes for a much better experience than fumbling around with 3-4 different products. I use this on my face for mustache/beard shaving and trimming and it's fantastic. Since the motor is small, I'm not sure how well this would work on larger applications like trimming your head hair. However, to maintain buzzed sides I could see this working well too. Overall, great product that shipped fast and is packaged nicely. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean just run it under the water. Trims beard up cleanly and evenly, my go to razor for a tidy up trim. Only downside is the razor "dock" that Gillette have produced. It doesn't actually hold the small guards and they fall out quite easily. Not a problem if you have a bag to keep them in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rennison

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor for A Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I have a very short and clean shaven beard and this razor was perfect for me. It costs about half of most high-quality razors cost and yet it manages to compete with them very well. I would recommend to anyone with a short beard! **NOTE** Always open up the top and clean the inside of the razor (Alot of hair gets caught up in there and easily messes up the razor)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for Men
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I made it this far without a tool like this! A bit of advice: if you like to maintain a beard shadow or some facial hair consistently then buy two of these. One for your face and one for the crown jewels. ALSO: use the guards! The #1 is short enough to get a close shave in the land down under without risking any cuts or knicks. It's effortless and game changing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Bought it as a replacement for the one we did have (same product). Wish it came with more than one razor! My only complaint is when you drop it trying to shave in the shower, you risk breaking the top plastic piece and have to buy a whole new razor.. (the reason we replaced in the first place). Our original one did seem to last forever though before I dropped it!
customer_reviews.author: kylie rice

customer_reviews.title: Total waste, I would think I got a bad one ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a replacement because it burned through a battery in less than 5 minutes. The new one does the same thing, I have to use two separate AA batteries to use it once. Total waste, I would think I got a bad one but the same thing happened with both.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaMcW

customer_reviews.title: Hair gets under Trimmer-head
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade for me from a Wahl personal trimmer. And what an upgrade. Takes a 3rd of the time to Manscape now. You can also throw your Proglide razor onto this and shave with a vibration setting. It's slightly more effective than a standard Proglide shave. I have one complaint though... There seems to be a lubricant under the trimmer-head. When you open it up, you will see hairs sticking heaven knows where. And it's next to impossible to clean that out. I pull out what I can with tweezers every once in a blue moon, but it's annoying none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Mauvemenacce

customer_reviews.title: Little and weak, but it does the job. Mostly.
customer_reviews.text: Cute little groomer, but not for serious work. If you have a dense and strong bear, look elsewhere. This is something you use to keep your stubble going. not for serious trim. And it is tiny, which, I guess, helps with fancy work, but again, nothing to serious. Machine is underpowered and not able to cope with denser "jungle".
customer_reviews.author: SerbianWolf

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for the first few weeks... Then the attachments broke and I cannot find replacements anywhere. Not that I should have to pay for cheap plastic pieces that brake very easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JSG9293

customer_reviews.title: And I love being able to bring this into the shower / ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this trimmer. I first bought it years ago and I think I traveled with it and dropped it too many times. I cracked the casing. It still worked, but the battery compartment was no longer waterproof. And I love being able to bring this into the shower / wash it under the sink. This thing is amazing. It's a tiny little package allows me to do so much. I used to use it to have a five o'clock shadow look all over. But now I use it to trim my neck and keep my beard in a manageable state. As well as some shower time down south trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Odom

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Small, easy to use, easy to clean, and has a convenient stand that takes up very little space. Bought this primarily to keep my goatee trimmed but also found it to be useful in manscaping down under. The guards provide protection in sensitive areas. I highly recommend. For the price, I have been more than happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Closest Shave Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Closest shave I've ever had! My regular shaver is a Gillette Sensor Excel. Been using it for many years but blades getting hard to find. Got this Fusion Proglide at great price and what a difference! Really close shave. I also use the single blade for trimming up my mustache and again, it does a great job. My only cons are the price of replacement blades and the size of the handle. It feels like your shaving with a small finishing hammer. It's a pretty chunky handle. I still use my Sensor Excel for regular days but this is my go-to blade for going out or needing that real good look.
customer_reviews.author: ralphh909

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I have used it a few times ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have used it a few times. I have not used it in the shower but probably will soon. I suggest when using it out of the shower to apply a hot towel to the area that you are grooming. The first time I used it I did this and suffered no little nicks. The second time I used it I forgot and nicked myself up in a few places. The nicks were painless at first so you do not notice them. It works well and the price, atleast at the time, was right.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for a SHORT beard
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine if you want to maintain a short beard or just stubble. But if you have a beard 1-inch or bigger, this is not going to work because the stand-off guards are not big enough. This kit comes with 3 guards, but they are all small. The kit is nice, however, and includes a nice option for the regular straight razor. It also looks nicer than most trimmers. It does NOT include a nose trimmer..
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Payne

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer useless after a while
customer_reviews.text: The blade razor obviously works fine as a normal Gilette razor, but the trimmer itself just gets bad after a while. I have strong beard and when it's grown i trim it down to 0 before shaving with the blade. After 2 months of trimming the trimmer just constantly gets stuck in the beard and stops (like not having enough power or not sharp enough), which is also kinda painful. This is my second ProGlide i have and it's going into trash. Won't buy again, i guess is just worth the cheap price. It also hard to clean deep inside when hair gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: aljaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this unit for a few years and still love it. I use it to trim my beard and mustache, of which it does a great job. A little drop of oil after every 3rd or 4th use and this just keeps on going. I like it so much I bought one for my oldest grandchild last Christmas and he also loves it. It runs a very long time off one AA battery.
customer_reviews.author: Higbe33

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: May not be the best out there but it's worth the money if your looking for a fair priced multi-tasking facial hair grooming product. However i don't think it is very good for the body hair. It seems to be mainly for the facial hair. With that said it's still pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: John Wick

customer_reviews.title: 5 star product but 2 star shipping with missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product on the whole and i didn't take the two stars off because there is anything wrong with the product itself, but because my package was missing one of the three guides that come along with it. Since this was my spare set for traveling purposes i didn't return the product but that's sort of a big downer when you don't get your money's worth. The Styler itself is a tremendous product though and its a shame that i can't give it a better review because of the negligence exhibited by the store that sold it.
customer_reviews.author: Sajjad K.

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Razor
customer_reviews.text: My favorite razor ever. Does a little bit of everything. Both razors work great on this! My husband uses both razors to shave his head. Battery lasts a long time and the quality is great. I have dropped in the tub many times and it just keeps on going.
customer_reviews.author: SarahKaye

customer_reviews.title: will be collecting dust
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. Its very weak and does not cut well. Due to covid-19, didnt open till late and missed return by date and will be collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Worst Value
customer_reviews.text: This product masquerading like the TV product, duped me into buying. Once received, I realized I had made a mistake and will research more closely before buying in the future. I paid over $25 for what functions like a $10 product. Never again will I allow this to happen to me. You'll be as disappointed in the quality of this product as I am, should you allow yourself to be duped by Gillette.
customer_reviews.author: blynd

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for me, when used properly.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, if you use it right. Using it without any of the attachments will shave ALL the hair off after a few passes, leaving only a little stubble. If you already have a beard or other hair you just want to trim, use one of the three attachments, numbered 1-3 in order of closeness (1 will cut the most length). I have not used the razor attachment as I already have a razor but it looks like it would work like the regular pro-glide razor. runs on a AA battery which is easy to replace when needed.
customer_reviews.author: F. M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Still deserves a 4
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wasn't as expected. Really cheaply feeling and just wasn't expected how it was going to be compared to what I was reading from the descriptions on here. It is a cheap razor I supposed but the razor hear is by far the only thing worth it in the package which can get in stores. The price just helped to sell it and the add ins in the package, but they are cheaply like. I love Gillette though in general so still giving them a 4. But just didn't like the add ons n how they turned out.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Nashion

customer_reviews.title: Best beard trimmer and styler...
customer_reviews.text: This is by far THE very best razor I've EVER purchased. I just got it June 2018 and cannot say enough good things about it. The trimmer combs that come in 3 sizes are excellent for trimming ones beard for a uniform look. Best to start with # 3 and thereafter depending on length you are looking for it's best to experiment. Also it works well to trim ones mustache and most of all the razor glides through foam in giving one a clean, close shave similar to an old fashioned barbers shop. For under $25 this is a great buy. Get it. Best razor/trimmer/styler you will ever own.
customer_reviews.author: HARISH

customer_reviews.title: Worked great ... once
customer_reviews.text: I recently grew a beard and thought this styler would be a useful grooming accessory. Unfortunately, it worked exactly one time - and then never worked again. I tried swapping out the batteries, to no effect. Upshot: not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan WellsTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: my favorite styler
customer_reviews.text: i really like this. i think i bought 2 3 quantity of this and gave to friends and parents. it works so well. i really like feature of trimmer, styler and shave. i am using this from almost 4-5 year and had no problem.
customer_reviews.author: pankaj

customer_reviews.title: I've bought 3
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish they included was extra blades for the razor as I cant find them anywhere in stores or online. I've bought 3 whole new machines so far because my previous blades ran out. I just wish I wouldn't have to buy an entire new machine for more blades. 5 stars for the product itself though, it's been consistent and is why I've owned 3.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the third personal trimmer I've owned. None of them last super long (2 years, then 1 year) but this one barely made it 6 months! It just stopped working one day, and I only use it about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Decent trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Decent trimmer, but can be frustrating to maintain. I have a pretty thick beard and it can be quite difficult to ensure hair doesn't get stuck. The clips/attachments that come with the trimmer could be better. Decent buy at this price point, but I'd do some additional research into other trimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is very cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my son at target the other day . Loved it ! I ordered another one on amazon for the same price and it came with a holder which is nuce
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I have owned 3. Never again.
customer_reviews.text: These things used to cost about $13 new. Now they are 30. I have owned 3 of them now and all 3 have broken after 6-12 months of use. Get yourself something better. I have no choice but to do so now.
customer_reviews.author: Davey Ram

customer_reviews.title: Price is low, however much better than my 250$ shaver
customer_reviews.text: Ill start by saying I shave my whole body. This device will get all of your hair with ease, and it does not cut you or leave marks, important if you shave EVERYWHERE lol. I persoanlly love the fact it takes batteries, dont have to wrry of a dying battery with continued use, and dont need to worry about missing a shave if i forgot to recharge the device. Bonus on this device being waterproof and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Michelz

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I didnt have allot of expectation for this item. but after using it for over a month, its worked very well. just have to go slowly around the private areas.
customer_reviews.author: vphan

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, I just don't find all the attachments to be necessary. I'd rather have a separate razor with a less bulky handle. The waterproof feature is nice. I don't use it often, but it is still in working condition with no noticeable defects. Wouldn't recommend for daily use or thick hair trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Guy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple months.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple months, now won't turn on. Cleaned it, changed batteries several times, and when I push the button to turn it on it starts for a split second then shuts off. 2-3 month lifespan when I only used it once a week is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Emmerson

customer_reviews.title: The best shave.
customer_reviews.text: Still using this years later! I love it! Its 100% waterproof, use it in the shower every couple days. The vibration while using the Gillette blades makes it such a smoother shave. My favorite shaver ever.
customer_reviews.author: angela frey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! But I wish it was true 0. It does leave some hair. Also did snipe and cut a bit when using around some of my body parts.
customer_reviews.author: Nav

customer_reviews.title: Good but not good enough?
customer_reviews.text: For the price this trimmer is great for your body. I use the trimmer with no guard on my upper body and pubic area... Yes you can knick yourself. However, its very easy not to. Its super simple to use but doesn't get a close enough shave for me. No matter what direction you trim it leaves a bit of stubble. I've had other trimmers that will trim smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: The job takes me on the road, sometimes for several weeks at a time and I was really sick of packing both the razor and the trimmer/groomer to keep myself looking my best. I had looked at this option a few times, and finally broke down and bought it. The trimmer is great and the razor gives me a great shave. It packs into space a bit bigger than a typical razor, but saves the bulk of packing the razor and another trimmer. Added bonus is it operates on batteries, so no matter where I am in the world, I will be able to use it without worrying about chargers.
customer_reviews.author: gpet73

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for about a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a month, then gradually lost power. I've only owned it for about a year and over time it would start pulling my hairs more and more often, instead of cutting them. Trimming my beard was a nightmare when I have to stop to restart it and deal with the pain every other second. I thought it could've been a battery issue, but it continued to act this way with a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: SkullKid4

customer_reviews.title: Will break after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: It was great in the beginning but 6 months past and the hair was getting caught in the motor and slowing it down. So I had to really deep clean it and yet never worked the same again. Then finally after 8 month the motor died. Its not like I used it like crazy. 3-4 times a weak in the morning. But a good razor should not die after such a short time. A company like Gillette should be able to manufacture a replacement head for the trimmer because I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for body grooming
customer_reviews.text: Never written a negative review for a product on amazon before, but I was disappointed by the longevity and quality of this shaver. I used it primarily as a body groomer before jumping in the shower, or sometimes during a shower since it was advertised as waterproof. In 3 months it started malfunctioning, only turning on sometimes even after battery replacement. A month later it is now officially dead. There were also times the blade would nick my skin and cut it while shaving, even despite being careful by using guards. Overall a disappointing experience and would not recommend trying.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Slegh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 2 years ago and it still in good condition. It gives a close trim and easy to maneuver. Like some of the other reviews say it does stop working at times and half the time changing the battery solves the problem, if that doesn't work you need to add some beard trimmer oil where the blades are or do what I do and just add a a squirt of wd-40 and it gets running again
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: good for face - not for rest of body
customer_reviews.text: gillette blades are great for the first 3-5 shaves but need to be replaced too quickly after. the styler works but may get clogged with hair easily. it is definitely only for your face as body hair has a difficult time being picked up
customer_reviews.author: stephen a.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to figure out the extensions, but after sorting that out, it's just so easy to use. Cleaning it takes some time; some hair do get stuck inside the unit, but other than that, this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Dex Masrey

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is great
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome. Great for beard trimming. Now my wife found it and I haven’t seen it for two days. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Parese-enterprise

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than 30 days of use
customer_reviews.text: It's a very simple battery operated beard trimmer. Probably overpriced a bit if it works but you get what you usually pay for. I didn't realize I was paying $23 for a disposable beard trimmer! Of course if quit working the day after my return window closed. Not sure what to do other than throw it away and learn to not try and cheap out on an item like this.
customer_reviews.author: Distressed Investor

customer_reviews.title: Strong and nice device !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it , I already bought the 3rd one ! Really good device for me beard , and not only , you can even do a haircut with it , very strong device!
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for man grooming, shave your boys clean so she doesn't go through Vietnam
customer_reviews.text: I use this specifically for man grooming. No pulling of hairs, it simply works, and it takes regular batteries so it's no brainier, no worries of rechargable sealed batteries dying and you needing to buy a new unit.
customer_reviews.author: The honest review guy.

customer_reviews.title: Nice beard trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The quarantine changed my look to include a beard. This trimmer has done really well at keep it groomed. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shaver! Honestly I'm thinking of getting one for myself as well... I think it would do a great job for the bikini area.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee

customer_reviews.title: So happy to buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for shavers on the go. This is the second time I’ve purchased this product because I literally kill this thing because I use it so much. A comfortable shave every time.
customer_reviews.author: Reds Review

product_meta.title: Gillette All Purpose Styler: Beard Trimmer, Fusion Razor & Edger for Men
product_meta.description: The All Purpose Gillette Styler trims evenly, shaves closely, and edges precisely. The Styler has everything you need to achieve any facial hair style: Trim - Waterproof trimmer is complete with three exchangeable combs (2mm, 4mm, 6mm) for consistent length and contour adaptability; Shave - Gillette ProGlide razor blades for men, from the brand you trust, deliver a close and comfortable shave; Edge - Precision Trimmer creates crisp, defined lines and finishing touches. Powered by Braun-engineered technology, the Styler is waterproof and shower safe, letting you trim while you shower. The All Purpose Styler lets you easily master any style with one precision tool. Works with any Gillette 5-blade razor refill (excluding GilletteLabs)
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: 1 trimmer, 1 ProGlide blade refill, 3 comb attachments (for different hair lengths), 1 battery, and an organizer
3 COMB SIZES (2mm, 4mm, 6mm) for customizing your style
FITS ALL GILLETTE 5-BLADE RAZOR REFILLS (excluding GilletteLabs)
BEARD TRIMMER with Braun engineered technology; Easy grip handle for precise trimming
PRECISION TRIMMER FOR EDGING designed for crisp, defined lines

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
